[**Dr.Â Jason Hawkins**](https://engineering.unl.edu/cee/faculty/jason-hawkins/) is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Civil & Environmental Engineering at UNL. He holds a Ph.D. (2021) in Civil Engineering from the University of Toronto and M.Sc. (2016) and B.Sc. (2014) in Civil Engineering from the University of Calgary. Dr. Hawkins completed postdoctoral work at the University of Texas at Austin. His primary research focus is the analysis of sustainable infrastructure systems through the application of a wide range of analytic tools.
